title: keen 4 3D info
content: dsl was working on a 3D keen 4 remake , and does someone know if dsl is still working on it ? cos i want to know if i can use his textures and some other stuff to make a level in commander keen style[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/sig-png.png[/img]

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content:
sorry, that project has unfortuneately been dead for more than a year now because of issued wich engine to use and how to make it ect. not much material was made either and i think you have to ask Duke4e on the forum (if he's still around) for textures since i didn't make any.

i would love to see that project coming true also but it was too much work and too much questions how to make this and how to make that.

hopefully someone who has the guts will do it properly [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content: to bad [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]   if you don't know what engine to use the unreal engine is a very good engine and easy to use to make levels [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/sig-png.png[/img]

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content: DSL do you know Duke4e's mail ?[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/sig-png.png[/img]

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content:
he he luckely i got old mails left in da inbox
duke4e@yahoo.com
i hope he uses it still.

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content: but youre still making the video right?[img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content:
not for the moment.
since i need to focus on "more important" stuff i'm forced to freeze the production for a while.

but since i'm a CK fan with all my heart, i WILL finish it one day.
and in the meantime i'll get practice from other projects.
like i'm going to learn Maya soon wich is a bit better (compared to 3dsmax) on the animation part so i'm looking forward to it.

i hope you can bare the wait...

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content:
We can wait until this community collapses, that means you have...

*checks watch*

... about 23 years. Get busy.

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content: Take all the time you need.  Glad to hear that you still plan on making it.  Good luck with Maya too![img]http://www.denness.net/rpi/username/mr12000[/img]

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content: mmmm i mailed duke 4e some time ago [11 March and 21 March] and still no reply [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [url=http://profile.xfire.com/memsys][img]http://miniprofile.xfire.com/bg/bg/type/2/memsys.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: keen 4 3D info
content:
yeah i know it's sad...
have not heard anything from that guy for a loong time.

but i'm actually taking a two year game developer class right now (started some months ago) and it's on a pretty high level.
i wish me and some neat programmer with nothing better to do could make this 3dversion come true. i have seen their stuff and they are certainly no noobist programmers [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]

i wish i had the time though [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img]
